title: I Want to Try It Too!
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Huh? Shioko and Kanan-senpai went diving? That’s awesome!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>How was it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>At first, I was nervous, but I got used to it because Kanan-san was by my side to guide me.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Spartan training...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>No, we didn’t do that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Did you see any fish?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Yeah, there were a lot! I took pictures with the fish with a waterproof camera!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Wow! I want to try it too! Hey, let’s ask Kanan if we could all go together next time!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I want to try it. Rina-chan Board says, “Determined.”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin is going to become one of Uchiura’s mermaids~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
